arche.rules.garbage_symbols module¶

arche.rules.garbage_symbols.garbage_symbols(items: arche.readers.items.Items) → arche.rules.result.Result¶

Find unwanted symbols in np.object columns.

Returns:A result containing item keys per field which contained any trash symbol
